overview: Chhoti Si Baat is a story of 12 year old Shiv who has been guarding a secret oh-so-confidently. His life comes to a halt in the midst of Ganpati Celebrations when things take an unexpected turn.
tagline: Chhoti Si Baat is a story of 12 year old Shiv who has been guarding a secret oh-so-confidently. His life comes to a halt in the midst of Ganpati Celebrations when things take an unexpected turn.
title: Chhoti Si Baat
